summary: The Arts Education for All Act aims to expand arts education in various settings. It amends the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act to include arts-related training for child care providers. It modifies the Elementary and Secondary Education Act to encourage arts education in schools, including reporting requirements and professional development for teachers. It also addresses arts in programs for neglected and delinquent youth, 21st-century community learning centers and juvenile justice programs. Further, it directs research on the effectiveness of arts education and mandates arts assessments.
